'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This newly constructed building makes use of the local waterfall to power the massive grindstones that process luminous adra into powder that can be exported to overseas markets. The whole operation is overseen by [Cortina](/cortina/).

## Points of interest

* This is a small, open location filled with crates of raw harvested adra and sacks of pulverized material ready for shipping. 
* A staircase leads to the balcony overlooking Queen's Berth, where you can find [Abraham](/abraham/).

## Characters

* [Cortina](/cortina/), the overseer.

## Pets

* [Abraham](/abraham/) - "Wet Dog": On the upper balcony.
